item.title: Help with input and shit
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

I have this

[code]public static boolean save = false;

public static void run() {
InputStreamReader input = new InputStreamReader(System.in);
BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(input);
save = reader.readLine();
	if (save = true) {
		saveChar();
	}
}

[/code]

but I get this error when I compile it:

saveGameHandler.java:20: incompatible types found : java.lang.String required: boolean save = reader.readLine(); ^

anybody know why I’m getting this? I can’t find my error, apparently it says that I need to use a boolean variable, even though I already am.

Read full topic
